1.2.7.en: Fix connection to non-broadcast interfaces after restart. Added support for sending and receiving telegrams directly from flows.

1.2.6.en: Improved error handling for missing interfaces

1.2.5.en: Add support for ethernet on Homey Pro 2023

1.2.4.en: Fixed an issue with the 'Trigger scene' Flow card not sending the correct address and scene data.

1.2.2.en: Fixed an issue with selecting a scene from the device quick-toggle.

1.2.1.en: Resolved the issue with selecting group addresses when adding new devices.

1.1.2.nl: Verbeterde stabiliteit van de KNX verbinding.

1.1.1.en: Add support for electric power measurement devices.
1.1.1.nl: Voegt ondersteuning toe voor elektrische verbruikmeters.

1.1.0.en: Connection to KNX network improvements and small protocol fixes.
1.1.0.nl: Betere verbinding naar het KNX netwerk en vele kleine verbeteringen.

1.0.13.en: Added automatic re-detection of KNX interfaces. This should re-find the used KNX interface if it's IP has changed over time.

1.3.1.en: Remove stop before up/down for windowcoverings
